name: FlashPlayer

properties.name: active
properties.description: True if this element is active.

properties.name: visible
properties.description: True if this element is shown, false if it is hidden.

properties.name: bounds
properties.description: The boundaries of the element, in parent-relative coordinates.

properties.name: location
properties.description: The upper left corner of this element relative to its parent.

properties.name: maximumSize
properties.description: The maximum height and width to which the element can be resized.

properties.name: minimumSize
properties.description: The minimum height and width to which the element can be resized.

properties.name: preferredSize
properties.description: The preferred size, used by layout managers to determine the best size for each element.

properties.name: size
properties.description: The current dimensions of this element.

properties.name: windowBounds
properties.description: The bounds of this element relative to the top-level parent window.

properties.name: alignment
properties.description: The alignment style for this element. If defined, this value overrides the

properties.name: properties
properties.description: An object that contains one or more creation properties of the container (properties used only when the element is created).

properties.name: enabled
properties.description: True if this element is enabled.

properties.name: helpTip
properties.description: The help text that is displayed when the mouse hovers over the element.

properties.name: indent
properties.description: The number of pixels to indent the element during automatic layout.

properties.name: window
properties.description: The window that this element belongs to.

methods.name: invokePlayerFunction
methods.description: Invokes an ActionScript function defined in the Flash application.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of a Flash ActionScript function that has been registered with the ExternalInterface object by the currently loaded SWF file.

parameters.name: argument
parameters.description: An argument to pass through to the function.

methods.name: loadMovie
methods.description: Loads a movie into the Flash Player, and begins playing it.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The File object for the SWF file to load.

methods.name: playMovie
methods.description: Restarts a movie that has been stopped.

parameters.description: When true, restarts the movie from the beginning; otherwise, starts playing from the	point where it was stopped.
parameters.name: rewind

methods.name: stopMovie
methods.description: Halts playback of the current movie.

methods.name: notify
methods.description: Sends a notification message, simulating the specified user interaction event.

parameters.name: eventName
parameters.description: The name of the control event handler to call.

methods.name: addEventListener
methods.description: Registers an event handler for a particular type of event occuring in this element.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The function that handles the event.
When true, the handler is called only in the capturing phase of the event propagation.
parameters.name: capturePhase

methods.name: removeEventListener
methods.description: Unregisters an event handler for a particular type of event occuring in this element.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The function that handles the event.
Whether to call the handler only in the capturing phase of the event propagation.
parameters.name: capturePhase

methods.name: dispatchEvent
methods.description: Simulates the occurrence of an event in this target.

description: A control that contains a Flash Player, which can load and play Flash movies stored in SWF files.
